mapper.select: select * from banner ORDER BY reg_datetime
mapper.insert: insert into banner(banner_image, reg_datetime, top_text, middle_text, bottom_text, link) VALUES (#{banner_image, typeHandler=JsonObjectTypeHandler}, now(), #{top_text}, #{middle_text}, #{bottom_text}, #{link})
mapper.update: update banner SET banner_image = IF(ISNULL(#{banner_image}), banner_image, #{banner_image, typeHandler=JsonObjectTypeHandler}), top_text = IF(ISNULL(#{top_text}), top_text, #{top_text}), middle_text = IF(ISNULL(#{middle_text}), middle_text, #{middle_text}), bottom_text = IF(ISNULL(#{bottom_text}), bottom_text, #{bottom_text}), link = IF(ISNULL(#{link}), link, #{link}) WHERE no = #{no}
